verses.name: Psalms 94:1
verses.text: O Lord God, to whom vengeance belongeth; O God, to whom vengeance belongeth, shew thyself.

verses.name: Psalms 94:2
verses.text: Lift up thyself, thou judge of the earth: render a reward to the proud.

verses.name: Psalms 94:3
verses.text: Lord, how long shall the wicked, how long shall the wicked triumph?

verses.name: Psalms 94:4
verses.text: How long shall they utter and speak hard things? and all the workers of iniquity boast themselves?

verses.name: Psalms 94:5
verses.text: They break in pieces thy people, O Lord, and afflict thine heritage.

verses.name: Psalms 94:6
verses.text: They slay the widow and the stranger, and murder the fatherless.

verses.name: Psalms 94:7
verses.text: Yet they say, The Lord shall not see, neither shall the God of Jacob regard it.
